message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $110.
Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product.
